content.text: Match ends, Marseille 3, Borussia Dortmund 0.
Second Half ends, Marseille 3, Borussia Dortmund 0.
Second yellow card to Jordan Ayew (Marseille).
Jordan Ayew (Marseille) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Attempt blocked. Lucas Barrios (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mario Götze.
Attempt blocked. Sven Bender (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Substitution, Marseille. Jean Philippe Sabo replaces André Ayew.
Lucas Barrios (Borussia Dortmund) hits the bar with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Sven Bender with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Jakub Blaszczykowski (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Jakub Blaszczykowski (Borussia Dortmund) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mario Götze.
Attempt saved. Jordan Ayew (Marseille) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mathieu Valbuena.
Offside, Marseille. André Ayew tries a through ball, but Jordan Ayew is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Jakub Blaszczykowski (Borussia Dortmund) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.

Foul by Lucas Barrios (Borussia Dortmund).

Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt missed. Jakub Blaszczykowski (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Mario Götze following a corner.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Nicolas Nkoulou.
Offside, Borussia Dortmund. Neven Subotic tries a through ball, but Lucas Barrios is caught offside.

Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt saved. Mario Götze (Borussia Dortmund) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jakub Blaszczykowski with a cross.
Goal!  Marseille 3, Borussia Dortmund 0. André Ayew (Marseille) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Penalty conceded by Sebastian Kehl (Borussia Dortmund) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Marseille. Loïc Remy draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Nicolas Nkoulou.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Ivan Perisic replaces Kevin Großkreutz.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Jakub Blaszczykowski replaces Shinji Kagawa.
